data.description:
**Security Control DEMO** is a 1-4 player co-op and PVP escape room game. You have fallen asleep on your first day of work and now have to evade the security officer to escape or get caught and fired. Hide, run, complete objectives, steal money and escape before you get fired!
{940159104519322}

# GAMEPLAY  
**The Cellphone**  
Your essential in-game companion: the Cellphone. Packed with versatile apps, it's your go-to for navigating the corporate maze. Stay connected with your team, hack security cameras, or boost your visibility with night vision.
{853394796816521}

**Play With Friends**  
Embark on your escape mission solo, with a squad of friends, or join an online lobby to outwit the vigilant security team. Utilize every resource available to make your way out of the corporate maze before you're caught. Can you and your team uncover the secrets of the workplace and make your grand escape, or will you assume the role of the relentless security guard to thwart their every move?
{3610153425901680}



**Complete Texts**  
While you are trying to escape your workplace your significant other is texting you to complete objectives before coming home! Make sure to complete all the texts before you come back from work, or you shouldn't come back at all!
{416018158075562}

**TRAVERSE EVER-CHANGING WORKPLACES**  
Play ten diverse workplace settings, each uniquely designed to capture the essence of different professional environments. With procedurally generated layouts, no two missions are alike.

changelog.change_log: Added a new objective, bug fixes for multiplayer, added a new room
Added preloading to help with lag in game.
Made security easier on first play through. Made security player slightly worse to make games more even.
Added a flashing lights warning + updated the change log
Added the ability to drink which increases max speed of walking / running temporarily + other bug fixes
Changed Security Office, Added another objective, added details on object hover.
Added the ability to buy skins, background noise when secuirty is chasing, more bug fixes.
Fixed hands being out of sync + other bugs
Improved lobby networking, fixed bug that stopped game from ending sometimes.

Security can use apps 
 Flashlight is now default and on 
 Bug fixes
Added a sound mixer to control levels of different sounds
New app that allows you to see your co-workers POV
If the person with the blue card gets put into county jail, the card gets returned to the security desk.
Added animation for getting caught / catching. Updated willow suites to be large (have backhalls), improved loading stutter on hosting game.
Added master volume + settings on cellphone
Added VR Settings, Added some game changes + some fixes
Updated the tutorial to make it easier to understand, some minor fixes
Updated Security AI for better pathfinding, High alert mode when released from Jail, Better microphone calibration, other fixes and improvements.
Fixed game not loading if microphone permissions are denied.
